question.para: How can I easily monitor the availability of several web sites?

answer.para: Add the host names of all web sites to the monitoring session (right click on the session node and 'Add Host(s)'; then select all hosts in the tree, right click and select 'Add Agent(s)'; from the list of available agents select 'Service Availablility'; in the configuration panel enter for 'Data' the value 'GET /' or 'GET /' FOLLOWED BY A BLANK LINE; for the 'Port' property enter the port where your web server if configured to listen and press 'Activate Agent'. From the list of views available for the session node enable then plot the one called 'TCP/IP services availability overview'. After you start your monitoring session the view will contain a table with the critical counters; if you want to add more agents just activate them and this view will be automatically updated.
Reactions can be disabled from the 'Actions\Disable Reactions' menu.
